byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Activist hedge fund Hudson Executive Capital confirms co-founder James C Woolery has resigned due to personal reasons.

headline.print_headline: Deal Maker Steps Down From Fund He Launched
headline.main: James C. Woolery Leaves Hudson Executive Capital Hedge Fund

snippet: Mr. Woolery, a co-founder of the activist fund, resigned for “personal reasons,” the firm said....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Woolery, a co-founder of the activist fund, resigned for “personal reasons,” the firm said.
